title: AI Chatbot-Based Personalized Science Education Support Strategy

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding Basic Scientific Theories and Experience in Utilizing Educational Technology
context.additional_context: Course for pre-/in-service teachers exploring AI chatbot integration in science education, featuring practice-oriented design tailored to individual learning paces and styles in BYOD environments.

learning_goals: Learners acquire the ability to apply the AI chatbot’s three-stage learning model (basic–application–advanced) to science subjects.
Learners implement chatbot personalization features with at least 80% accuracy to build customized online learning environments.
Learners explain how to use AI chatbots as formative assessment tools to monitor learners’ real-time progress.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
